name: The Fire Ballers
description:
multi characters are playing against each other where each one is shooting his own tower, the one who finishes first moves to the next round, there where only one character should win the level.

The game comes with many stages each stage has many levels. there are different types of towers and barriers for each level.

Here is an available trial version of the game, and there is an asset version published on Unity Asset Store which has a lot of systems that would help any developer to build a similar type of games.

You can check the asset on Unity Asset Store through the following link:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/game-toolkits/the-fire-ballers-19386...
